delta.name: Declination
delta.desc: Angle of noontime sun relative to the equatorial plane

beta.name: Altitude
beta.desc: Angle of sun above the horizon

betaN.name: Noontime Altitute
betaN.desc: Angle of sun above the horizon at solar noon

azimuth.name: Azimuth
azimuth.desc: Degrees east or west of solar noon, as seen from the ground

solarAngle.name: Hour Angle
solarAngle.desc: Degrees of Earth's rotation before solar noon

LTM.name: Local Time Meridian
LTM.desc: Nominal longitude value for your time zone

timeOffset.name: Time Offset
timeOffset.desc: Current difference between local and solar time
